description: Stops an InferSNOMEDCT inference job in progress.

parameters.name: JobId
parameters.description: The job id of the asynchronous InferSNOMEDCT job to be stopped.

nested_items.name: JobId
nested_items.description: The identifier generated for the job. To get the status of job, use this identifier with the DescribeSNOMEDCTInferenceJob operation.
